Default.title: Default Judge.
Default.description: Evaluates Configuration MaxTasksPerConfiguration times. Good for default Configuration estimation.

MaxTasksPerConfiguration.description: Minimum times to evaluate (run) each Configuration.

Student.title: Student Judge.
Student.description: Checks the overall absolute deviation between Tasks and takes into account Configuration quality (how it close to default / current best Configuration). Good for further Configuration estimation.

MinTasksPerConfiguration.description: Minimum times to evaluate (run) each Configuration.

MaxTasksPerConfiguration.description: Maximum times to evaluate (run) each Configuration.
